name: cabin roof kid's cooking class
description:
A perhaps-memorable-because-it's-so-mind-scarring or better-erased-by-means-of-black-magic game that will take less than 5 minutes to barely survive through.

The fifth game in the IDK Project series.

Synopsis:

Time to learn from the best sensei ever - Grab the alcohol and get cooking!

WARNINGS:

Contains death jokes, references to memes, talk of blood and murder, "cooking" with alcohol, and accidental arson.
